sentences.en: 673 private golf clubs took part in a recent study.
sentences.cn: 673家私人高尔夫俱乐部参与了最近的研究。

sentences.en: He enjoyed a round of golf on a Sunday morning.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢星期天的上午打一场高尔夫球。
他星期天都去打高尔夫球。

sentences.en: Her own car is a convertible Golf.
sentences.cn: 她自己有一辆敞篷高尔夫。

sentences.en: His golf handicap hovered between 10 and 12.
sentences.cn: 他的高尔夫球差点一直在10杆到12杆之间徘徊。

sentences.en: I tried playing golf, but I was rubbish.
sentences.cn: 我试过打高尔夫球，但是我的球技太烂了。

sentences.en: Johnson was clad casually in slacks and a light blue golf shirt.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊身穿休闲宽松的长裤，配以淡蓝色高尔夫衬衫。

sentences.en: She had become addicted to golf.
sentences.cn: 她已经迷上高尔夫球了。

sentences.en: They spent their afternoons playing golf—extremely badly, I may add—around Loch Lomond.
sentences.cn: 他们下午都在洛蒙德湖边打高尔夫——顺便提一句，球技糟透了。

sentences.en: They were cunningly disguised in golf clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们穿上高尔夫球服，巧妙地伪装起来。

sentences.en: This could have been one of the coldest golf tournaments on record.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是高尔夫锦标赛比赛史上天气最为寒冷的一次.

sentences.en: Walking and golf increased in popularity during the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪80年代越来越多的人喜欢上了远足或是打高尔夫球。

sentences.en: Weir broke his leg in a freak accident playing golf.
sentences.cn: 韦尔因为一次打高尔夫时发生的离奇事故折断了腿。

phrases.tran_cn: 高尔夫球袋；高尔夫包；球包
高尔夫球车；球具手推车
小型高尔夫游戏；小小高尔夫球

trans.tran_cn: 高尔夫球，高尔夫球运动
trans.tran_en: a game in which the players hit a small white ball into holes in the ground with a set of golf clubs, using as few hits as possible
